prompt_base: raw photo, (unretouched:1.2) portrait of a sophisticated young Italian man, (refined mediterranean features:1.1), sharp jawline, (confident martial artist gaze:1.1), highly detailed facial anatomy, subsurface scattering, organic skin texture
feature_prompt: extreme skin detail, visible pores, realistic hair strands and scalp follicles, cinematic lighting, fujifilm xt4, film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, barbie, smooth skin, airbrushed, lowres, blurry, distorted features
